list.title: Go
list.content: Go is the most powerful, performant, and scalable programming language for creating web applications, web APIs, micro-services, and other distributed services.

list.title: Python
list.content: Python is a popular programming language for that can be used for web development (server-side),software development, scripting.

list.title: Javascript & Typescript
list.content: Node.js is an open-source and cross-platform JavaScript runtime environment. It is a popular tool for almost any kind of project

list.title: React
list.content: React is a declarative, efficient, and flexible JavaScript library for building user interfaces

list.title: Vue js
list.content: Vue js is a progressive framework for building user interfaces.

list.title: Gin
list.content: Gin is a high-performance HTTP web framework written in Golang (Go)

list.title: REST APIS
list.content: It is an architectural style that defines a set of rules in order to create Web Services

list.title: Postgres
list.content: open source database management system. It supports both SQL and JSON for relational and non-relational queries for extensibility and SQL compliance.

list.title: MySQL
list.content: MySQL is a leading open source database management system. It is a multi-user, multithreaded database management system

list.title: MongoDB
list.content: MongoDB, the most popular NoSQL database, is an open-source document-oriented database.

list.title: Docker
list.content: Docker is an open source containerization platform. It enables developers to package applications into containers

list.title: Web3 & Solidity
list.content: Web3 is a new generation of the internet that runs on public blockchains
